name: Steve and the curse of the Hermit
name_original: Steve and the curse of the Hermit
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 38. Theme: Small World.

Steve is cursed. The curse makes people that recognizes him explode. Violently. Luckily, Steve is a smart guy and moved to the most remote town where no one could possibly know him. Or so he thought. Turns out he runs into old colleagues, friends, neighbours, pretty much everyone he's ever known, constantly.

Steve locks himself up in his home as long as he can, but sadly, Steve has to eat. And shopping for Steve is truly a dangerous mission.

Ludum dare : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/steve-and-the-curse-of-the-hermit

Made by Jonas & Björn at Goblin Portal
Music by Abstraction. www.abstractionmusic.com
